name: clean-browsing
description: A Firefox-first browsing enhancement extension with customizable dashboard, universal sidepanel, and productivity widgets
author: Dimitri Meimaridis

scripts.test: echo 'Running extension validation tests' && node -e "const manifest = require('./extension/manifest.json'); console.log('Manifest valid:', manifest.name, manifest.version);"
scripts.build: echo 'No build process required - pure vanilla JS extension'
scripts.package: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./extension/manifest.json').version"); rm -rf dist/firefox; mkdir -p dist; rsync -a --delete --exclude '.DS_Store' extension/ dist/firefox/; cd dist && zip -r clean-browsing-firefox-v$VERSION.zip firefox
scripts.lint: echo 'No linter configured - using browser dev tools for validation'
